categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Mikaen was a Human male who served as a supply officer in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Ilum, he was stationed in the Imperial base camp.
Supply Officer Mikaen first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as a vendor on Ilum for the Empire.
